attributes.action: release PSLewis back to the Scoobynet community in time for Christmas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PSLewis the stalWART of Scoobynet, lies festering in lesser forums as a result of over zealous infractions. Please add your name to support his return in time for nursey to bathe him before the Queen’s speach.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
